Bosses.Name: Hydaelyn (Phase 1)
Bosses.Strategy: Watch out for her Dawn Mantle. Red icon means stack inside her hitbox, green means stay away from her, blue means that she'll cast large line AoEs in a cross shape from her position.

KeyMechanics.Name: Dawn Mantle
KeyMechanics.Description:
Boss swaps weapons to indicate which mechanic is used:

Dancer chakrams (Red icon):
Large donut AoE. Safe zone inside her hitbox.
White Mage staff (Green icon):
Large circle AoE around the boss.
Paladin Sword & Shield (Blue icon): Cross shaped line AoEs at Hydaelyn's position.

Bosses.Name: Crystals of Light (Add Phase)
Bosses.Strategy: Destroy all of the crystals before Hydaelyn's Conviction bar reaches 100.

KeyMechanics.Name: Hydaelyn's Ray
KeyMechanics.Description: Proximity dive attack. Stand far away from the line.

KeyMechanics.Name: Crystalline Blizzard III
KeyMechanics.Description: Targeted circle AoEs under all players.

Bosses.Name: Hydaelyn (Phase 2)
Bosses.Strategy: React to mechanics from phase 1, while she also casts Crystallize, which is either a party stack or circle AoEs around each player. Memorize in which order the Chakrams from Parhelion go out to avoid upcoming AoEs. Stand in the safe quadrant when she casts Lightwave. Stay with your party when she casts Echoes.

KeyMechanics.Name: Crystallize
KeyMechanics.Description: Casts either AoE puddles below every player or a stack marker after a certain delay, usually shortly after Dawn Mantle is cast.

KeyMechanics.Name: Parhelion
KeyMechanics.Description: Fires 3 sets of line AoEs towards each third of the arena.

KeyMechanics.Name: Subparhelion
KeyMechanics.Description: The chakrams from Parhelion will fly back to the opposite side of the arena in the order they were cast, covering the entire platform, so movement is mandatory.

KeyMechanics.Name: Parhelic Circle
KeyMechanics.Description: Yellow lines on the ground will form a snowflake shape. At the end of this cast light orbs are summoned and moved to the ends of the yellow lines, subsequently exploding in circle AoEs.

KeyMechanics.Name: Lightwave
KeyMechanics.Description: Four large waves of light spawn at the edge of the arena, slowly moving over the platform. Typically has one quarter of the arena as safe zone.

KeyMechanics.Name: Echoes
KeyMechanics.Description: Multi-hit stack marker. Cast during Lightwave.
